items.title: Taking Stock: Market extends gain for fifth day, posts longest winning streak in two months
items.description: 140 stocks touched their 52-week highs on the BSE, including Emami, Godfrey Phillips, Britannia Industries, Colgate Palmolive, Marico, Dabur India, Varun Beverages, Nestle, HUL, Godrej Consumer, Tata Consumer Products, Patanjali Foods, United Spirits, Radico Khaitan, United Breweries, among others.

items.title: UltraTech Cement to Sell 2.01 Crore Shares in India Cements
items.description: UltraTech Cement to Sell 2.01 Crore Shares in India Cements

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top stocks that moved the most on August 20
items.description: From HUL to Ola Electric, here are the top stocks that moved the most on August 20

items.title: Power Finance Corporation shares decline 1.54% amid volume surge; stock among top losers on Nifty Next 50
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 403.70, Power Finance Corporation has shown a decline of 1.54% in today’s session amid high volume, with bearish sentiment prevailing in the market.

items.title: Nifty Notches Fifth Day Of Gains; Clocks 25,000 Amid Big Buying In IT Shares: Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty clocks 5-day winning streak. Nifty ends above 25,000 after 3 attempts. Mid & smallcaps extend gains; breadth positive. IT sees big buying; Infosys, TCS lead. Banks underperform; pharma extends losses. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Ola Electric Mobility hits upper circuit; share price rises 19.99%
items.description: With the stock's price reaching the upper circuit at Rs 53.79, Ola Electric Mobility has shown a strong upward trend in today's session, driven by market dynamics and investor activity.

items.title: LT Technology Services shares gain 1.42% amid volume surge
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 4,232.60, LT Technology Services shows a positive move with surge in volumes.

items.title: Max Healthcare Institute shares decline amid volume surge; stock down 0.43%
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,224.10, Max Healthcare Institute Limited has shown a slight decrease in today's session amid volume surge.

items.title: Newly-listed shares gain; Bluestone up 14%, Anthem Biosciences, Prostarm rise up to 10%
items.description: Bluestone Jewellery shares surged more than 14 percent in Wednesday's trading session to an intraday high of Rs 625 per share on the NSE.

items.title: Hindustan Aeronautics shares rise 0.32% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis reported a bearish sentiment on the stock as of August 13, 2025.

items.title: Syngene International share price falls 2.02%; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 669.25, Syngene International experienced a notable decline in today's session, reflecting broader market dynamics and investor reactions to the company's financial health and corporate actions.

items.title: Advent-backed CDMO firm Cohance scouts for western API assets to meet demand and hedge against tariffs
items.description: Cohance already supplies API intermediates from India but sees strategic value in owning Western manufacturing capabilities.

items.title: Bharat Electronics share price falls 2.03% in today's trading on Nifty 50
items.description: With Bharat Electronics trading at Rs 372.35, the stock has experienced a notable decline today, as the stock is included as one of the stocks in the benchmark NIFTY 50 index.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares jump 2% after telco drops Rs 249 plan, Jefferies sees 31% upside potential
items.description: Bharti Airtel share price: Airtel's website shows the price of the plan has changed to Rs 299. It will now offer 1 GB data and 100 SMS per day for 28 days.

items.title: Torrent Power shares decline 0.88% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,286.00, Torrent Power has seen a slight downturn amid high volume trading in today's session.

items.title: GST tax hike could choke ITC, tobacco peers
items.description: Significant hike in tobacco tax rates have depressed volumes severely in the past, warned analysts
